content: will become the thumb so from round 22 to round 42 work as follows round 22 work the leaf chart until the 6th stitch pm work from the thumb chart pm continue with the 8th stitch from leaf chart repeat leaf chart 3 more time round 23 to 42 work following the leaf chart until 6th stitch sm work from the thumb chart sm continue with the 8th stitch from the leaf chart repeat the leaf chart 3 more times thumb has 21 sts round 43 work the leaf chart until first marker remove it and place the thumb sts in a waste yarn for later cast on 1 sts with main color remove the second marker and continue with the leaf chart until the end of round 1 st increased 56 sts 4 complete hand work the rest of the leaf chart until round 56 break your contrasting color yarn with your main color work 2 5cm / 1in about 10 rounds in 1x1 rib bind off 56 sts 5 work thumb slip 21 sts from waste yarn back to your needles pick up 1 st in gap where thumb meets palm you should be working a total of 22 stitches with your main color work 1 5cm / ½in about 5 rounds in 1x1 rib bind off 22 sts mitt 2 complete second mitt in the same way as the first finishing weave in all ends to the back of the work soak in warm water to allow the stitches to relax press dry between towels shape mitts to position thumb dry flat and leave to fully dry enjoy your mitts if you have any questions you can email me at romi-damelalata@hotmail com @damelalata romi-damelalata keep the leaf by romi- dame la lata -
